item.description: Dr. Jakub Rydzewski email: jr@fizyka.umk.pl (0x9C1099DF) wire: @jkrd x: @JakubRydzewski orcid: 0000-0003-4325-4177 arXiv: 0000-0003-4325-4177 scholar: dEMXOpcAAAAJ github: @jakryd Scientific Career 2023-2024 Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) Fellow at the National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology (AIST), Japan, the group of Prof. Tetsuya Morishita. Rev. 6, 011304 (2025) Special Collection: AI and Machine Learning in Chemical and Materials Science doi:10.1063/5.0245177 / arXiv:2412.20868 G.A. Tribello, M. Bonomi, G. Bussi, C. Camilloni, et al. PLUMED Tutorials: A Collaborative, Community-Driven Learning Ecosystem arXiv:2412.03595 T. Gökdemir, J. Rydzewski A Note on Spectral Map arXiv:2412.04011 2024 J. Rydzewski Spectral Map for Slow Collective Variables, Markovian Dynamics, and Transition State Ensembles

Software PLUMED – an open-source, community-developed library that provides methods for enhanced sampling, free energy estimation, and analysis of molecular dynamics (MD) simulations. Modules for PLUMED2: lowlearner maze lowlearner (version beta) [1,2] / zenodo lowlearner is a code for learning collective variables (CVs) from standard and enhanced sampling simulations. Installation script and examples can be found in the Zenodo dataset. It is implemented as a module for PLUMED2, an engine for free energy calculations of atomistic systems and enhanced sampling.
